name: fitsystem-monorepo
description: FitSystem Monorepo with NestJS + Angular 21 SSR

scripts.install:all: cd server && npm install && cd ../client-fitsystem && npm install && cd ../client-math && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client-fitsystem && npm run build:ssr && cd ../client-math && npm run build:ssr
